noun.description: Palaeontology. A rudist bivalve mollusc of the Cretaceous genus Radiolites or family Radiolitidae.
Mineralogy. A variety of natrolite occurring in masses with a radiated structure. Chiefly historical.

origin: Mid 19th century. From radius + -o- + -lite. In sense 1 after either French radiolite or scientific Latin Radiolites, genus name.
